data.name: helpActive
data.value: Indicates if the user is active.

data.name: helpAddProduct
data.value: [+] Add Product

data.name: helpAddUser
data.value: [+] Add User

data.name: helpAllowNegativeInventories
data.value: Select this if you do not wish to track inventories for this product.

data.name: helpAnalytics
data.value: Copy and past your analytics code here (such as Google Analytics). This code will then be included in each page to help you collect data.

data.name: helpApiPassword
data.value: This is the PayPal API Password required to use the PayPal API.

data.name: helpApiSignature
data.value: The PayPal API Signature is an encrypted string required to use the PayPal API.

data.name: helpApiUserName
data.value: This is the PayPal API Username required to use the PayPal API.

data.name: helpBaseSku
data.value: This is the base Sku for the product. If the product has attributes, then the final sku will use this as the base.

data.name: helpBrowsingCategory
data.value: If you would like to track when a category is viewed, then select this.

data.name: helpBrowsingProduct
data.value: If you would like to track when a product is viewed, then select this.

data.name: helpBusinessEmail
data.value: This is the email account you use for your PayPal account.

data.name: helpCategoryDescription
data.value: The description will appear on the category page. This will give visitors to your site an idea of the types of products they will find in the category.

data.name: helpCategoryImageFile
data.value: This image file will be displayed at the top of the category page.

data.name: helpCategoryItems
data.value: This sets the number of items that are displayed in the catalog page. We recommend keeping this number between 6 - 12, depending on your skin and layout.

data.name: helpCategoryName
data.value: This is the name of the category that will be displayed in the navigation.

data.name: helpCollectBrowsingStatistics
data.value: Select this if you would like to collect browsing statistics. However, please note that if the site is frequently crawled or very popular, this can result in a lot of database records being created.

data.name: helpCollectSearchTerms
data.value: If you would like to track the search terms that are searched on the site, then select this.

data.name: helpContent
data.value: This is the content of the page. Write whatever you want on the page in here.

data.name: helpCurrency
data.value: Select the currency for the site.

data.name: helpDatabaseName
data.value: This is the name of the database that was created on the database server.

data.name: helpDatabasePassword
data.value: This is the password for the user account.

data.name: helpDatabaseServer
data.value: The database server name should be supplied by your hosting provider. If you are unsure, please contact the hosting provider.

data.name: helpDatabaseUserName
data.value: This is the name of the user account that has access to the database server. This account is usually created when creating the database.

data.name: helpDefaultRate
data.value: The is the default rate that will be used in the event that an appropriate rate is not found.

data.name: helpDescription
data.value: The words entered here will be included in the META tag included in this page.

data.name: helpDescriptorDescription
data.value: This is descriptive text that is meant to showcase and differentiate the product. This can include technical specifications, features, etc. You can add multiple descriptors to a product, so you can break these out however you like.

data.name: helpDescriptorTitle
data.value: The title of the descriptive text. This will be displayed above the Description.

data.name: helpDisplayNarrowByManufacturer
data.value: This option determines whether the Narrow By Manufacturer widget is displayed on the catalog page.

data.name: helpDisplaySortBy
data.value: This option determines whether the Sort By widget is displayed on the catalog page.

data.name: helpDisplayNarrowByCategory
data.value: This option determines whether the narrow by sub-category widget is displayed on the catalog page.

data.name: helpDisplayNarrowByPrice
data.value: This option determines whether the Narrow By Price widget is displayed on the catalog page.

data.name: helpDisplayRatings
data.value: This option determines whether the product reviews feature is enabled.

data.name: helpDisplayShippingOnCart
data.value: This option determines whether the shipping options is displayed on cart.

data.name: helpDisplayRetailPrice
data.value: This option determines whether the product Retail Price is displayed.

data.name: helpEmail
data.value: The email address of the registered user.

data.name: helpFooter
data.value: Adjusts the footer color.

data.name: helpHeight
data.value: The height of the header area. Adjust this for a larger or smaller content area.

data.name: helpImageCaption
data.value: The image caption will appear below the image on the product page.

data.name: helpImageFile
data.value: This is the image file used.

data.name: helpIsLive
data.value: Select this if you are ready to go live with your site.

data.name: helpKeywords
data.value: The keywords entered here will be included in the META tag included in this page.

data.name: helpLanguage
data.value: Select the language for the site.

data.name: helpLoginRequirement
data.value: Select if and when you will require people to log into the site.

data.name: helpLongCache
data.value: The length, in seconds, of the long cache duration.

data.name: helpMailRequireSsl
data.value: If your mail server requires SSL, ensure this is selected.

data.name: helpMailSettingsFrom
data.value: This is the email address that will be used to send emails.

data.name: helpMailSettingsHost
data.value: This is the email server you will use. Most frequently it will look like "mail.yourdomain.com", but consult your hosting provider if you are unsure.

data.name: helpMailSettingsPassword
data.value: This is the password for the account that will be used to log into your mail server when sending system emails.

data.name: helpMailSettingsPort
data.value: This is the port that the SMTP service is listening on for sending emails. Most frequently this is 25, but consult your hosting provider if you are unsure. If you leave this blank we will default it to port 25.

data.name: helpMailSettingsUserName
data.value: This is the user name of the account that will be used to log into your mail server when sending system emails.

data.name: helpManufacturerName
data.value: The name of the manufacturer you are adding.

data.name: helpMenuTitle
data.value: This is the title that will appear in the site navigation. This should be pretty short and easily identifiable.

data.name: helpName
data.value: The name of the product.

data.name: helpNewsFeedUrl
data.value: You may enter the URL for an RSS feed here and that feed will be displayed in the "News" section on the dashBoard page.

data.name: helpNormalCache
data.value: The length, in seconds, of the normal cache duration.

data.name: helpPageTemplate
data.value: This is the template that the page will use when being created.

data.name: helpParentCategory
data.value: This determines the category that is the parent of the category you are creating. If you wish your category to be at the top level, then select "Root".

data.name: helpParentPage
data.value: This determines which page or navigational node is the parent of the page your are creating. If you wish your page to be at the top level, then select "Root".

data.name: helpPdtId
data.value: This is the PayPal PDT Id required as part of the PayPal Standard process.

data.name: helppPayPalApiUserName
data.value: This is the PayPal API UserName.

data.name: helpProductEnabled
data.value: A product is only enabled once all of the attributes, if any, have been assigned to the product and the Sku\'s have been saved. If a product does not have any attributes, then the base Sku will be used for the single Sku item. If you wish to enable a product, please check the Sku tab to ensure they have been saved.

data.name: helpProvider
data.value: Select the type of content provider you wish to use.

data.name: helpRate
data.value: The is the tax rate that will be applied to the purchase for the provided region code.

data.name: helpRegionCode
data.value: This is the region code associated with the provided rate.This will act as the primary lookup criteria.

data.name: helpRegionTitle
data.value: This is the title for the content region.

data.name: helpRequireAuthentication
data.value: If your mail server requires authentication in order to send email, ensure this is selected. In most cases, you should have this selected as it will help prevent email SPAM.

data.name: helpRequireSsl
data.value: Check this if your site will be utilizing SSL. For sites that redirect to another site to process payment (such as when using PayPal Standard) then you may de-select this. If you are unsure, please ensure it is selected until you are certain you will not need it.

data.name: helpShipFromCountry
data.value: This is the Country from which the packages will be shipped.

data.name: helpShipFromZip
data.value: This is the Postal Code from which the packages will be shipped.

data.name: helpShippingBuffer
data.value: This is a buffer that is added to the calculated shipping amount.

data.name: helpShortCache
data.value: The length, in seconds, of the short cache duration.

data.name: helpShortDescription
data.value: A short description of the product.

data.name: helpShowTitle
data.value: Select this if you want the title for the content region to be displayed.

data.name: helpSimpleWeightAmountPerUnit
data.value: The amount to be charged per unit for shipping.

data.name: helpSimpleWeightService
data.value: The name of the service to be used.

data.name: helpSiteLogo
data.value: This allows you to select the logo that will be used for the site.

data.name: helpSiteName
data.value: This is the name of the site and will frequently appear in the title bar.

data.name: helpSortOrder
data.value: Determines the sort order for the element.

data.name: helpTagLine
data.value: Your TagLine will appear in your emails. Make it something catchy!!

data.name: helpTemplateRegion
data.value: Based on the Page Template, you can now select in which Template Region you want this content area to appear.

data.name: helpTheme
data.value: Select the theme for the site.

data.name: helpTitle
data.value: This is the title of the page that will appear in browser window. This can be pretty long and descriptive. If you want to include an existing .aspx page, you can put in \'mypage.aspx\' and dashCommerce will then link to the existing web page.

data.name: helpUseCache
data.value: Caching can increase the speed of your website by keeping some of the site information in memory. You should use caching if you have large product catalogs or if you want your site to respond quicker. When developing, you should keep caching off as the changes you make on the administrative side of the site may not be reflected immediately.

data.name: helpGenerateThumbs
data.value: Will automatically create thumbnails for product and catalog pages.

data.name: helpUserName
data.value: This is the user name of the registered user.

data.name: helpUseShipping
data.value: This is a system wide setting. If your store will require the shipping of products, then select Use Shipping.

data.name: helpWidth
data.value: Sets the width of the site in pixels.

data.name: noHelp
data.value: No help available.

data.name: helpCopyrightText
data.value: The text that will be put into the copyright Meta Tag. If blank it will use the Site Name.

data.name: helphShowdCCopyright
data.value: Insert "dashCommerce" into the page Generator Meta Tag.

data.name: helpSiteDescription
data.value: Site Description that will be put into the description Meta Tag.

data.name: helpSiteKeywords
data.value: A comma delimited list of keywords for the site that will be put into the keyword Meta Tag.

data.name: helpMaximumProductsToAddToCart
data.value: For stores that carry high inventories, this will restrict the drop down list for the amount of products that can be added to the cart.

data.name: helpFilter
data.value: This is a comma separated list of state or province abbreviations for which you would like to recieve tax rates.

data.name: helpMailSettingTo
data.value: Website admin email address to send contact us email to.

data.name: helpBackToErrorLogListing
data.value: <- Back to Error Log Listing

data.name: helpDownloadDescriptionHelp
data.value: This is a description of the file and it\'s contents.

data.name: helpDownloadTitleHelp
data.value: Title for the file.

data.name: helpForPurchaseOnly
data.value: Downloads marked as "For Purchase Only" will only be accessible by people that have purchased the product.

data.name: helpManufacturer
data.value: This is the Manufacturer of the product.

data.name: helpProductType
data.value: This is the Type of Product. You can use this to do certain things based on the product type.

data.name: helpLicenseKey
data.value: This is the License Key that is created when you purchased the dashCommerce Tax Web Service at dashCommerce.com. You will get this from the My Account page at dashCommerce.com.

data.name: helpPassword
data.value: This is your password for the dashCommerce.com web site.

data.name: helpProviderConfigurationControlPath
data.value: This is the path to the configuration control that is tied to your provider. Most of these will live in "~/admin/control/configuration/...". Check other providers to see how this is done.

data.name: helpProviderDescription
data.value: This is a description of the provider. This will appear on the provider configuration page, so it is a good idea to make this as detailed as you can.

data.name: helpProviderName
data.value: This should be the name of the class of the provider. In the case where you have purchased the provider, the provider vendor should be able to supply this information.

data.name: helpUser
data.value: This is your username for the dashCommerce.com web site.

data.name: helpAddTaxToPrice
data.value: Select this if you would like to have tax added to the displayed price. This is most often used by VAT tax users.

data.name: helpTaxRate
data.value: If your configured TaxProvider supports product level taxation, then you will be able to select the applicable tax rate here.

data.name: helpStoreClosed
data.value:
When you select this option, your site will appear to be closed to visitors on their next web site page request.

If you happen to forget to turn the store back on AND logout, you can log back in by going directly to http://yoursitename/login.aspx

data.name: helpPayPalPending
data.value: This transaction has been created using the PayPal Express Checkout Accelerated Boarding process. Prior to shipment, you should verify receipt of payment.

data.name: helpCouponCode
data.value: This is the coupon code that will be needed by your customers in order to apply the coupon.

data.name: helpCouponExpirationDate
data.value: This is the expiration date of the coupon.

data.name: helpCouponIsSingleUse
data.value: This is provided for those that wish to customize dashCommerce for single use coupons. No logic is provided to account for how you wish to apply a single use coupon, but we do provide the field for use if you wish to customize this behavior.

data.name: helpCouponPercentOff
data.value: This is the percentage off you wish to be applied for the coupon. This should be entered in decimal form. For example, for a 10% coupon, you would enter .10.
